p: This investigation shows promising results in order to use EOs for disinfection purposes in poultry farms and/or in hatcheries environment. The mixture with C. zeylanimcum and S. aromaticum could be a useful alternative treatment against E. coli. Moreover, C. citratus used alone could be employed to fight both E. coli and A. fumigatus, while A. triphylla EO would be used to enhance the control of sporesâ€™ burden, aiming to reduce the risk of infection for both animals and workers.
